airpods.title: boAt Airdopes 131 - Wireless Earbuds
airpods.desc: Sleek. Comfortable. Stylish. And a Splash of Incredible Colours. Bring alive your favourite sounds with these true wireless earbuds. Equipped with 13mm drivers for the magical boAt signature sound. Designed for supreme ease with Insta Wake N’ Pair technology that auto connects the moment it’s out of the case and Type C Charging. Tws earbuds to drown all the sounds you don’t need and live every moment. With a battery capacity of 40mAh for each earbud, indulge in a blissful audio experience for up to 3 hours in a go. Tap into instant wireless functionality with optimum Bluetooth V5.
airpods.disc2: boAt Signature Sound for music lovers  Where sound is everything. The most immersive music experience equipped with 13mm drivers that will transport you to another world.

airpods.title: BOAT Airdopes 441 - Wireless Earbuds
airpods.desc: Plug Into Nirvana with boAt Airdopes 441 TWS earbuds to enjoy your music in a truly wireless way. It has the IWP (Insta Wake N’ Pair) Technology, meaning as soon as one opens the charging case lid, the best earbuds power on and enter connection mode. The TWS Airdopes 441 come equipped with 6mm drivers for immersive sound. It offers a seamless user experience via its capacitive touch controls
airpods.disc2: Instant Wireless Connectivity BT 5.0 TWS Airdopes 441 offers true wireless experience with the latest Bluetooth v5.0.

airpods.title: boAt Airdopes 451v2
airpods.desc: boAt Airdopes 451v2 - Wireless Earbuds Indulge in the immersive sound of Airdopes 451v2 bluetooth earbuds powered by boAt Signature Sound and 10mm drivers. Pause your music by plugging out your earbuds and plug in to continue with the in-ear detection. With our ENxTM Technology, experience uninterrupted calling, getting rid of the background noise in a meeting. For the sporty ones, it comes with IPX7 Rain & Sweat Shield, so you could sweat it out even when the heavens are pouring. Never stop groovin’ to your favourite tracks with Airdopes 451v2.
airpods.disc2: boAt Airdopes 451v2 - boAt Lifestyle of total playback Leave all the charging worries at bay. Keep yourself plugged all day; charge for 5 minutes, and enjoy for 60 minutes

airpods.title: Zoom Airdopes 101 Made In India
airpods.desc: Airdopes 101 - Made In IndiaBehold the beauty of a truly wireless listening experience with Airdopes 101 Made in India earbuds. Your connected life is just now away with boAt IWP™ Technology pairs with your device as soon as you open its case. Revel in the joy of quality music with its powerful 13mm drivers that ensure you listen to your favourite tracks with thumping bass and crystal-clear clarity. Its massive playback of 15 hours lets nothing come in between your jam. Effortlessly switch songs and receive calls with its instant response Touch Controls. Want to know something without making an effort to type it? Make your voice assistant do it for you by activating it through a single touch. All this and more are waiting for your attention. Where are you?
airpods.desc2: IWP™ TechnologyExperience a seamless connected life with boAt IWP™ Technology that effortlessly pairs the Airdopes with the media device as soon as the case lid is opened.

airpods.title: Airdopes 141 - Wireless Earbuds
airpods.desc: Airdopes 141 - Wireless Earbuds Let the noise of the world drown as you jam to your rhythm with Airdopes 141. Equipped with 8mm drivers, these dope wireless earbuds make your playlist sound better with crystal clear audio quality and powerful bass. Experience seamless calling and be clearly heard with ENxTM Technology. That is not all,  ASAPTM Charge technology empowers you with 75 minutes of playback with just 5 minutes of charging. With IPX4 Sweat and Water Resistance, theres no stopping you from listening to your workout mix while breaking a sweat. Moreover, its IWPTM Technology and Quick Response Touch Controls ensure you can answer calls and switch music without interrupting your flow. Go ahead, your perfect audio match is right here.
airpods.disc2: Charge for 5 minutes, groove for 75 minutes Let nothing come in between your grooving sessions or important calls. With just 5 mins of charging, enjoy 75 mins of uninterrupted performance.

airpods.title: boAt Airdopes 381 - In Ear Wireless Earbuds
airpods.desc: boAt Airdopes 381 Equipped with 7mm rhythmic dynamic drivers for immersive HD sound. Perfectly designed for the outdoors with IPX5 Sweat and Water Resistance. Seamless connectivity with Bluetooth v5.0, so that nothing stops your day. Style your workouts with only the best true wireless earbuds. With a battery capacity of 500mAh for each earbud, indulge in blissful audio experience for up to 4 hours in a go. The ergonomically designed TWS Airdopes 381 are truly dope!
airpods.disc2: Designed to power your workoutsNo compromises on fitness with the best true wireless earphones. IPX5 Sweat and Water resistance technology to boost your strength sessions.

airpods.title: Airdopes 115 - Best Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
airpods.desc: Airdopes 115 - Best Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Pro gamer? We got you. A do-it-all hustler? Even better! Airdopes 115 is the perfect choice for both worlds. Its 13mm drivers will make you experience a thumping bass and drown you in the unbeatable boAt Signature Sound. Get the gamer to win matches with minimum lag powered by BEAST™ Mode. Call disturbance will never be an issue with ENx™ technology that makes calls crystal clear for you. So, pick from its dynamic colours & vibe limitless with its 24HRS playback.
airpods.disc2: 13mm Drivers - boAt Immersive AudioWith 13mm drivers, boAt Immersive Audio shines through even in loud and noisy surroundings.

airpods.title: boAt Airdopes 402 - Wireless Earbuds
airpods.desc: boAt Airdopes 402 Ride through the highest waves of Nirvana on your boAt Airdopes 402 wireless earbuds. Drown in your favourite rhythm with its immersive 10mm drivers and boAt Signature Sound. Its IWP™️ technology and Bluetooth v5.2 offers a seamless and truly wireless listening experience. Let nothing come in between you and your music with its massive 30HRS of playback. Even if you manage to exhaust your battery, ASAP charge empowers you with another 60 minutes of playback within 5 minutes of charge. Let your thoughts echo clear and loud with ENx™️ technology that ensures crystal clear voice delivery. Navigating through your music and calls is a breeze with its Easy Touch Controls. Do it all and more with Airdopes 402.
airpods.disc2: INSTA WAKE n Pair Technology Connect your device to these dope earbuds effortlessly with Insta Wake and Pair Technology.

airpods.title: boAt Airdopes 161 - Wireless Earbuds
airpods.desc: boAt Airdopes 161 - Wireless Earbuds Your partner for every vibe, Airdopes 161 earbuds pumps uninterrupted music with its massive playback of upto 17 hour. And when you run out of battery, you can enjoy 180 mins of music with just 10 minutes of charge. Grooving has never been so hasslefree with Bluetooth v5.1 that seamlessly plays your music. Gone are the days when you had to check if your device is connected or not. Our. connects with your paired devices as soon as you open the lid of the case. Indulge in our immersive sound with its 10mm driver and enjoy music for every vibe.
airpods.disc2: Bluetooth v5.1 Enjoy a flawless, uninterrupted and smooth music delivery every time. The latest Bluetooth v5.1 has got you covered

airpods.title: BOAT Airdopes 491 - Wireless Earbuds
airpods.desc: boAt Airdopes 491 Plug Into Nirvana with boAt Airdopes 491 true wireless earbuds to enjoy your playlist in a truly wireless way. You can tap into 15 times the charge with its herculean 1800mAh carry cum charging case. With a battery capacity of 43mAh for each earbud, indulge in blissful audio experience for up to 5.5 hours in a go. It has the IP67 rated shield to offers resistance against water and dust. The noise-canceling earbuds Airdopes 491 come equipped with 6mm drivers for immersive sound. The stereo calling feature lets the user indulge in smooth and clear chats over calls. Its latest Bluetooth v5.0 offers seamless instant connectivity.
airpods.disc2: 4 Hours of Auditory Nirvana Per Charge It helps to stay Plugged Into Nirvana for extended durations with up to 4 hours of sound per charge.

airpods.title: Airdopes 411 ANC
airpods.desc: Airdopes 411 ANC - Best Noise-Cancelling earbuds Choose music, not noise with Airdopes 411 ANC by suppressing noise up to 25dB with Active Noise Cancellation. Never run out of juice as you enjoy your playlist with its ASAPTM Charge that gets you 60 minutes of performance with just 10 minutes of charge. Just plug in and listen to the #SoundThatMatters!
